document.full_text: dallas forward dirk nowitzki said the torn tendon in the middle finger of his left hand would not pose a problem when the mavericks face the miami heat in game two of the nba finals on thursday.
document.title: nowitzki unfazed by finger injury
lines_and_colors: dallas forward dirk nowitzki said the torn tendon in the middle finger of his left hand would not pose a problem when the mavericks face the miami heat in game two of the nba finals on thursday.
